overview:
Daniel DomiÂ­nguez is the current CEO at i-azul.

Daniel was born in Colombia and after he finished his studies on Mechatronics Engineering, he moved to Europe to continue his education on Robotics, Artificial Intelligence and Virtual Reality.

He started The-Camus-Project, which was basically his research and projects as student on Robotics and Virtual Reality. The website became a great online success on the world of robotics for enthusiastic and students, and was linked on NASA “The Robotics Alliance Project” and many other important robotics sites and online robotics communities.

He also worked as a researcher and as an I.T Engineer in China and later he founded i-azul back in Latin America.
